description: J3O files can be created by the SDK's Scene Composer program or by importing a 3D scene that is saved in the OgreXML format. Blender, an open source 3D modeling tool, provides OgreXML export and therefore is a common tool for creating JME scenes. After an OgreXML scene is imported, you can right-click the model and choose "Convert to JME binary" to convert the model into the J3O format.
NOTE: You can preview J3O files with SceneViewer, a program included with the jMonkeyEngine SDK.
